name: Dr.Johne Doe
description: The Division of Pediatric Pulmonary Medicine is a well-established clinical, training and research program. The group provides multidisciplinary comprehensive consultation, diagnostic and management services.

name: Jennifer
description: Department of General Pediatrics, Pediatric Hematology, and Oncology at University Hospital Tübingen provides care for infants, children, and adolescents with acute and acquired diseases as well as blood disorders and neoplastic diseases. The department is considered to be one of the best facilities for the treatment of diabetes mellitus in children in Germany, according to FOCUS Magazine.
